dcterms:creator: X. Liu
H. Zhao
M. Tian
L. Sheng
J. Shao
S. Yi
J. Yan
X. Wang
dcterms:description: The PA100K dataset is constructed by images captured from 598 real outdoor surveillance cameras, containing a total of 100,000 pedestrian images. Each image is annotated with 26 attributes.
dcterms:title: PA100K

dcterms:creator: D. Li
Z. Zhang
X. Chen
K. Huang
dcterms:description: RAP v1 is a large-scale person re-identification dataset that focuses on predicting various attributes such as gender, age, and clothing. It comprises 41,585 pedestrian images gathered from 26 surveillance cameras, encompassing 69 binary attributes.
dcterms:title: RAP v1

dcterms:creator: Y. Deng
P. Luo
C. C. Loy
X. Tang
dcterms:description: PETA serves the purpose of recognizing pedestrian attributes and holds significance in video surveillance applications. It comprises a collection of 19,000 pedestrian images, encompassing 65 attributes, which consist of 61 binary attributes and 4 multi-class attributes.
dcterms:title: PETA

dcterms:creator: A. Specker
M. Cormier
J. Beyerer
dcterms:description: UPAR is designed for pedestrian attribute recognition and person retrieval tasks in video surveillance and fashion retrieval. It unifies several datasets by providing additional annotations to harmonize important binary attributes across the datasets.
dcterms:title: UPAR

dcterms:creator: W. Yang
P. Luo
L. Lin
dcterms:description: The People Clothing Segmentation (PCS) dataset comprises of 1000 images with corresponding semantic segmentation masks. There are 59 semantic label classes, comprising both the background and clothing types.
dcterms:title: People Clothing Segmentation (PCS)
